title: Land use and misuse
creator_credit: Davidson Films and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Describes malpractice in the use of land surfaces. Shows how deforestation, erosion by wind and water, industrial and agricultural abuses and urban development can create loss of water, crops and wildlife and can even cause climatic changes. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
